titles: Bishop Taylor's judgment concerning the power of parents over their children in his Ductor dubitantium, &c., edit. IV, 1696
author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
notes: Extracts from the author's Ductor dubitantium, 1696 edition, p. 700-701.
"Possibly published in connection with the controversy in May-June 1714 over 'An act to prevent the growth of schism', directed against Dissenters' educational institutions"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Religious education --  Law and legislation --  England.
